You and Rah enjoy hanging out by the river docks together watching the boats. You two enjoy seeing what ships come in and the different things and people they bring.

One day, an odd and fancy looking steamer docks at the river. It has strange colorful lights and has an odd sleek design to it. It looks expensive.

"I wonder what that boat's for..." Rah says to you, perplexed.

Take a closer lookIgnore it
